headline: IFF’s 2024 Do More Good Report Highlights Progress in Sustainability and Innovation
summary: NEW YORK, June 25, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF)—a global leader in flavors, fragrances, food ingredients, health, and biosciences—has released its 2024 Do More Good Report which showcases a year of meaningful progress, transformative innovation, and commitment to people and the planet. The report highlights key accomplishments across the organization and emphasizes the impact of IFF’s sustainable solutions through four core pillars, aligned with its new theme, 'The Science of Possible': Conscious Sourc
